channel.description:
I have a server i never really had any problems until now
Server started to get laggy out of no where and you dc a lot and this ends up happining: [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2vd5pir.png[/img]
Also i have a problem with willow trees... when ever someone uses willows there client turns white screen... i tested this on more then one client so it is server sided... i have no clue how to fix this :O i will rep++ for help
